item.description:
The American Cancer Society DetermiNation program has teamed up with the Manchester City Marathon as an official charity for the race on November 1. We are in need of volunteers to support our athletes who are participating in the race on behalf of the Society and working hard to raise money for this very worthy cause.

We are looking for volunteers to assist us with Cheer Stations, to cheer on our DetermiNation program runners, and all others running in the race that day. Specific route locations will be determined as the race gets closer, but all will be in Manchester.

This is a great opportunity to meet others while also supporting a great cause.

Please email Holly.Randall@cancer.org or call 603.471.4124 for more information on the DetermiNation program!

For more information on our program, visit our website:
http://determination....
item.name: Volunteer Opportunity with the American Cancer Society
